body.p: In today's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, we'll tell you about the progress that has been made integrating SELinux into Gentoo: we now have experimental LiveCDs and stages from which SELinux can be built from scratch. While the online and international communities were relatively quiet this week, we have plenty of other content, including a profile of developer Sergey Kuleshov, a tip about using watch to repeat commands, and more. Enjoy!
